sentences.sContent: And so, we get many more statements of "Japanese uniqueness" and the impossibility of foreigners truly understanding Japan.
sentences.sContent_eng: And so, we get many more statements of "Japanese uniqueness" and the impossibility of foreigners truly understanding Japan.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我们得到了许多“日本的独特性”的陈述，而外国人不可能真正了解日本。

sentences.sContent: No one everyone believed that the renal dialysis technology was a unique kind of technology, and it was because of that uniqueness that we believed it was affordable.
sentences.sContent_eng: No one everyone believed that the renal dialysis technology was a unique kind of technology, and it was because of that uniqueness that we believed it was affordable.
sentences.sCn: 没有人认为，肾透析技术是一种独特的技术，而且由于这种独特性，我们就认为它是负担得起的。

synos.tran: 独特性；独一无二；单值性

words.tran: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的
